history.proof: revert a x y m; induction l as [| b l IHl]; intros. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - destruct m as [| c m]. + simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. + simpl. destruct (bin_add a x y) as [r z]. specialize (IHl r b c m). simpl in IHl. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: revert a x y m; induction l as [| b l IHl]; intros.
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: revert a x y m; induction l as [| b l IHl]; intros.
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: revert a x y m; induction l as [| b l IHl]; intros. - simpl. rewrite lb_plus_fix_0. destruct (bin_add a x y) as [r z]. reflexivity. - destruct m as [| c m]. + simpl. rewrite lb_plus_fix_1. destruct (bin_add a x y) as [r z]. reflexivity. + simpl. destruct (bin_add a x y) as [r z]. specialize (IHl r b c m). simpl in IHl. rewrite IHl. reflexivity.
